group_1.textCenter: Yes! It was a Familiar!
Oh, oh, but first, I have to tell you.@There were these three girls there...
They stomped it flat in one go, like@SQUISH! Just like that.
But really! Who would believe it!
And uh, I was feeling really down, then you@showed up!
And you know what?! You know what!@Um... Ummmmmm!
(Darn! I'm so nervous I can't even talk!)
(What can I say, uh... Let's see...um...)
(Ah, got it!)
Hey, did you know? There's this rumor@about a sickness that affects Magical Girls!
You just suddenly get super dizzy, then you@fall down! That's it! Out!
But, actually...I think it's probably just@anemia!
I won't get anemia though 'cause I live in a@factory. My skin absorbs a lot of iron!
Because, well, you know...
Oh! Yeah, yeah, that's right! The most@important thing!
I see you in sooo many magazines! To think,@you're a Magical Girl, too!
I'm so, so happy we could meet like this!@It's the best! Like...
Um, I'm actually a fashion designer. Ya know,@an upcoming one! I'll be one in the future!
These are some of my most recent designs,@so...please take a look!
Oh? This one? Yeah, those are mushrooms!
From what I've heard, it's not actually@an illness.
But I gotta say, it's kind of a nasty@rumor...
They say the one doing it is a Magical Girl.@She's using her magic to do it.
But, you know what? I just can't believe@that!
Aren't we all supposed to be on the same@side?!
So why would anyone hurt their friends like@that...
Right? You feel the same way, yeah?@We ARE friends, aren't we?!
Cool! Well then, I'm definitely gonna keep@on cheering my heart out!
Really, it's the least I can do!
All right, I'll do it quick then! Iâ€™m@cheering for the safety of all Magical Girls!
Go! Fight! Win!
Oh, sorry! Did I hurt your ears?
My, my, what's the matter? That's quite@a grim look on your face...
Hm? Oh, is that so! Well...how awful!
I see! That's a relief, isn't it!
So you're looking into that rumor now?
But I don't know any girls who'd do anything@like that.
Girls I've met recently? Me?
Like the ones that everyone's been talking@about lately?
They're saying they're probably the culprits.
I'm not so sure, though.
Ah, okay... Well, in that case, it's@certainly something you have to look into.
Yes, well, we go way back, so...
Oh, yes, I met one. I don't know@anything about them.
Yes, we only talked a little. I think she@just wanted to see what was up.
Nooo, she was so soft-spoken and kind,@I can't imagine she'd do anything bad...
Her name? Oh yes, she told me. Let's see,@it was...
Hazuki...Yusa, I think?
She seemed the sort of girl who'd be fun to@tease. Shame I didn't get to try...
Aw, you're leaving already? You should@relax a little while longer!
All right, you take care too, then...
Yachiyo!
